@ fhollande "This is an unprecedented book by its design and financing."
. @ fhollande "You have once again demonstrated the achievements of French engineering and public works companies"

. @ fhollande "Beyond @Bordeaux, all the territories will benefit from the commissioning of LGV"
. @ fhollande "All that has been committed will serve to serve the whole of the great south-west and change the relationship to distance, time"
. @ fhollande "LGV will also enhance the attractiveness of the territories served and favor new business areas"
. @ fhollande "This will encourage travelers to prefer the train to the car and the plane."

. @ fhollande "We need major projects, equipment, infrastructure. Since 2012, I wanted this national rail strategy"
@ fhollande "We need to think France at 20, at 30, think about what we want to do for the territories."
. @ fhollande "We do not do this only for France but also for Europe through the interconnection of networks"
@ fhollande "You have to believe in French genius In terms of infrastructure, France is the leader in the world"
